From: Ruben Verborgh <ruben.verborgh@...>
Subject: The object-resource impedance mismatch
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=466918125; y=I6qFS6MoCXAJ8jteku3qWYXRGfy0HCuGfqsI4fk6Rx6Ckajz0kRN4sI

Hi there,

We=92re all familiar with the the differences between objects fr=
om programming languages
and resources used in a REST environment.

A good =
understanding of the resources-and-representations model is required
to dev=
elop a REST application, but many many implementations stick too hard
to th=
e used technologies (which makes us end up with, for example, RPC-style).

=
Instead of explaining how to model an object-oriented schema as an HTTP art=
icle,
I decided to do it the other way round and show how to model HTTP in =
JavaScript.
You can see the results at
http://ruben.verborgh.org/blog/2012/=
09/27/the-object-resource-impedance-mismatch/

I=92m looking forward to you=
r comments and suggestions.

Best,

Ruben
